column1: I absolutely loved this movie! It was full of life and joy.
This was the worst movie I have ever seen. Completely pointless.
It was okayâ€”nothing special, but not terrible either.
The cinematography was stunning, and the story was deeply emotional.
I felt really disappointed with the character development.
Great concept but poorly executed. I expected more.
Beautifully written and acted. It made me cry and smile.
